projects.title: Shape Channels
projects.description: Channels is a dedicated messaging app for clear and organized project communication for construction teams. Keep all your conversations, files, photos, issues, and progress updates in one easily accessible location. Track down information quickly and ensure everyone is on the same page. Enhanced Visibility: Gain a clear view of project progress with photos, updates, and discussions in one place
features: Real-time messaging and notifications using Stream Chat SDK
Project-based conversations
File and document sharing
single monolithic codebase for both Mobile and Web

projects.title: Platable
projects.description: Every day, delicious food from your favorite spots goes to waste because it does not get sold. With Platable, you can snag Surprise Bags filled with quality eats, save some cash, and do your part to help reduce food waste.
features: Guest user and logged-in user support
Google Maps Clustering, location tracking, and order tracking
Payment Processing with Stripe
Firebase Cloud Messaging for real-time updates
Firebase Crashlytics for error tracking
Analytics for user behavior tracking
Built with flutter and later upgraded to native android and iOS

projects.title: Kalido: the opportunities app
projects.description: Kalido is an amazing AI powered platform that creates abundant opportunities for individuals in enterprises and communities. Our intuitive tools match your skills to people, teams, projects and jobs to surface economic, professional and social opportunities that would otherwise stay hidden.
features: AI-powered matching of skills to opportunities
Jetpack compose for modern UI development
Linkedin like profile creation and management
Real-time notifications and updates
Android powered with Kotlin and Modern Android Architecture

projects.title: Habit Tracker : HabitBoard
projects.description: Welcome to HabitBoard the premier habit tracking application carefully crafted to facilitate your journey towards personal growth and self-improvement!
features: Customizable habit tracking with reminders
Progress visualization through charts and statistics
Daily motivational quotes to inspire users
User-friendly interface with Material You design
Built with Flutter for cross-platform support
